title: Build Stability Guardrails

sections: CI as Single Source of Truth
rules: Pin ALL versions explicitly — Kotlin, Compose, AGP, JDK
Never use floating versions (`1.+`, `latest.*`)
Upgrade one dependency at a time, verify CI green
CI preflight build on every PR
CI builds clean (no local caches)
Build all targets: Android + JVM/Desktop
If CI green = it works, local issues are cache problems
Don't debug "ghost errors" — clear cache first
If error persists after cache clear, it's a real bug
Read actual error, not just "build failed"
Test ViewModels independently
Use fakes, not mocks
Test state transitions
Preview composables for visual testing
